channel.title: This again?
channel.description: Okay, since I cannot host my server because of some internet problems, I need some other way of hosting. Anyone know of a site that has FreeVPSs or something like this? I would really need it. Like a 7 day trial would be great.

item.title: This again?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:341625”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=438026.msg3219206#msg3219206 date=1275014430]
1and1.com gives you a 3 month free trail, all you have to pay is the set up fee. It only lasts for another 3 days so I would hurry.
[/quote]

He said free, not pay for free.[/quote]

set up fees are generally not very much, and 3 months free for a simple setup fee is a gimme compared to paying 30$+ per month for 3 months.

Read full topic
